items.value: Answer the following questions as best you can and find out in minutes if you have a claim. If you need help at any stage, call us on 1800 305 568.

label.value: Have you or someone you know, been injured at work or suffered an illness as a result of work?

events.change:
if($field == 'No', dispatchEvent($form, 'custom:journeyEnd', {msg:'*Thank you for your enquiry*. 
 It looks like your injury doesnt qualify for a work cover claim. 
 But, if you want to discuss your injury further, dont hesitate to call us on 1800 431 530 We are here to help any way we can.'}),'')

label.value: In which state or territory did the injury or illness occur?In which state or territory did the injury or illness occur?

events.change:
if($field != 'VIC', dispatchEvent($form, 'custom:journeyEnd', {msg:'*Thank you for your enquiry.* 
 The Maurice Blackburn Free Claim Check is not currently available in this location. 
 Please dont hesitate to call us on 1800 431 530 to discuss your possible claim regarding an injury or illness.'}),'')

items.name: treament

label.value: Tell us about your medical treatment?

enum: I have been referred to a specialist
I have had/will be having surgery
I am in a psychiatric facility
I am in a rehabilitation facility

items.name: injury
enum: My enquiry relates to a death
Loss of one of the other senses

label.value: Have you made an insurance claim?
What was the result of the claim?

rules.visible: $form.claim.treament =='I have been referred to a specialist' || $form.claim.treament =='None of the above'

label.value: Have you had time off work due to your injury or illness?

items.name: email
items.description: It's a promise that we will not spam you
items.screenReaderText: Provide your email address so that we can reply to you.

constraintMessages.pattern: Please enter a valid email address

items.name: phone
items.description: Your mobile number where we can reach you. But only if you want
items.screenReaderText: Enter you mobile number without the ISD code

constraintMessages.pattern: Phone number must be 10 digit long
constraintMessages.minimum: Phone number must be 10 digit long
constraintMessages.maximum: Phone number must be 10 digit long

items.name: postalcode
items.description: Your postal code where we can reach you.

constraintMessages.pattern: Postal Code number must be 6 digit long
constraintMessages.maximum: Postal Code number must be 6 digit long

label.value: Is there anything else you would like us to know? (optional)
I agree to Maurice Blackburn collecting this information and getting in contact with me with in accordance with the Collection Statement and Privacy Policy

items.value: Maurice Blackburn's Privacy Policy and Collection Statement

*Thank you for your enquiry*. 
 It looks like your injury doesn't qualify for a work cover claim. 
 But, if you want to discuss your injury further, don't hesitate to call us on 1800 431 530 We are here to help any way we can.

*Thank you for your enquiry.* 
 The Maurice Blackburn `Free Claim Check` is not currently available in this location. 
 Please don't hesitate to call us on 1800 431 530 to discuss your possible claim regarding an injury or illness.

metadata.name: Work Injury
metadata.thankYouMsg:
It looks like you might have a potential claim. 
 We will call you within 24 hours (during our business hours 8am - 8pm AEST Monday-Friday) to discuss your potential claim and your obligation-free consultation
